column4: I'm trying to ssh, and telnet, but both are not working. I'm getting "ssh: connect to host spoonx.nl port 22: Network is unreachable" while it's clearly reachable.
why is it "clearly reachable"?
Because the website is up, and I can ssh in from my phone.
But ssh is not working for me with any host. Same for telnet
is your phone on the same network that the machine you are connecting from is on?
No. But I'm trying that now.
Now it is. So I think it's a network thing.
I did enable port range forwarding
On port 22 and 80
is the server on the same local network?  How are you trying to connect? (you can pm any private info)
It's not on the same local network. It's a vps somewhere two cities from here.
ok
Also tested it with mx1 through 4 .hotmailcom (telnet)
.com*
Perhaps it's my port range forwarding.
Fail... I still had my port filtering for port 22 enabled.
ah
:p
Now ssh works but telnet doesn't =_=
why would anyone use telnet :x
I want to try a helo
Checking if I'm going to spam or not. Just a test.
